paidContent.description: Paid content events for premium resources

_comments._overview: Nostr protocol configuration - controls relay usage, event types, and publishing defaults
_comments.relays: Relay configuration for different use cases
_comments.relays.default: Default relays used for general event publishing and fetching. These should be reliable, well-connected relays.
_comments.relays.content: Relays specifically for content events (courses, resources). Often a subset of default relays for better performance.
_comments.relays.profile: Relays optimized for user profile data. May include specialized profile aggregators like purplepag.es.
_comments.relays.zapThreads: Relays used by the zapthreads widget for Lightning comments and zaps. Should match zapthreads configuration.
_comments.relays.custom: User-defined custom relays that can be added dynamically. Empty by default.
_comments.eventTypes: Nostr event type definitions and their NIPs
_comments.eventTypes.courseList: NIP-51 list events for course curation (kind 30004)
_comments.eventTypes.freeContent: NIP-23 long-form content for free educational resources
_comments.eventTypes.paidContent: NIP-99 paid content events for premium resources
_comments.eventTypes.contactList: NIP-02 contact list and relay configuration (kind 3)
_comments.publishingDefaults: Default settings for publishing Nostr events
_comments.publishingDefaults.tags: Default tags added to all published events
_comments.publishingDefaults.tags.includeClientTag: Add client identification tag to events
_comments.publishingDefaults.retryAttempts: Number of retry attempts for failed publishes
_comments.features.enableRealtimeSync: Enable real-time synchronization of events from relays
_comments.features.cacheProfiles: Cache user profiles locally to reduce relay queries
_comments.features.cacheEventsDuration: How long to cache events in seconds (5 minutes default)
_comments.features.autoReconnect: Automatically reconnect to relays on disconnect
_comments.features.reconnectInterval: Time between reconnection attempts in milliseconds
_comments.features.maxReconnectAttempts: Maximum number of reconnection attempts before giving up
_comments.contentDefaults.contentTags: Default tags added to content events (language, license, platform)
